Element.Name: Specification identification
Element.Description: An identification of the specification containing the total set of rules regarding semantic content, cardinalities and business rules to which the data contained in the instance document conforms.

Element.Name: Business process type identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears. It enables the buyer to process the document in an appropriate way.

Element.Name: Qualification identifier
Element.Description: Identifier of the qualificaton document, MUST be expressed in a UUID syntax (RFC 4122)

Element.Name: Reference number
Element.Description: An identifier that is specified by the buyer and used as a reference number for all documents in the procurement process. It is also known as procurement project identifier, procurement reference number or contract folder identifier.

Element.Name: Qualification issue date
Element.Description: The date when the qualification is issued by the economic operator.

Element.Name: Qualification issue time
Element.Description: The time when the qualification is issued by the economic operator. The issue time must have granularity of seconds, and include time zone information

Element.Name: Qualification document version identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the version of the document

Element.Name: A class to describe the Economic Operator or Group of Economic Operators that want to qualify for the Call for Tender.
Lot identifier
Element.Description: An identifier of the lots for which the Economic Operator want to qualify.

Element.Name: The Economic Operator that is responsible for the submission of the qualification document. In case there is a group of economic operators there is always one main economic operator and an unspecified number of additional economic operator qualifying for a contract.
Economic operator
Element.Description: Any natural or legal person or public entity or group of such persons and/or entities, including any temporary association of undertakings, which offers the execution of works and/or a work, the supply of products or the provision of services on the market.

Element.Name: Economic operator electronic address identifier
Element.Description: Electronic address of the economic operator.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier for electronic address identifier

Element.Name: Economic operator identifier
Element.Description: An identifier that identifies the economic operator, such as a legal registration identifier.

Element.Name: Economic operator name
Element.Description: The name of the economic operator.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in an address.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of a city where the address is located.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: The subdivision of a country such as region, county, state, province etc.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.

Element.Name: Economic operator legal form
Element.Description: A textual description of the legal form of the economic operator.

Element.Name: Contact point
Element.Description: The name of the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact fax number
Element.Description: A fax number for the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: An e-mail address for the contact point.

Element.Name: In case there is a group of economic operators there is an unspecified number of additional economic operator qualifying for a contract.
Economic operator
Element.Description: Any natural or legal person or public entity or group of such persons and/or entities, including any temporary association of undertakings, which offers the execution of works and/or a work, the supply of products or the provision of services on the market.

Element.Name: Economic operator electronic address identifier
Element.Description: Electronic address of the economic operator.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier for electronic address identifier

Element.Name: Economic operator identifier
Element.Description: An identifier that identifies the economic operator, such as a legal registration identifier.

Element.Name: Economic operator name
Element.Description: The name of the economic operator.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in an address.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of a city where the address is located.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: The subdivision of a country such as region, county, state, province etc.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.

Element.Name: Economic operator legal form
Element.Description: A textual description of the legal form of the economic operator.

Element.Name: Contact point
Element.Description: The name of the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact fax number
Element.Description: A fax number for the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: An e-mail address for the contact point.

Element.Name: Contracting body
Element.Description: The contracting authority or contracting entity who is buying supplies, services or public works using a tendering procedure as described in the applicable directive (Directives 2014/24/EU, 2014/25/EU).

Element.Name: Contracting body electronic address identifier
Element.Description: Electronic address of the contracting body

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier for electronic address identifier

Element.Name: Contracting body identifier
Element.Description: The national identifier of a contracting body as it is legally registered (e.g. VAT identification, such as KBO)

Element.Name: Contracting body name
Element.Description: The name of the contracting body as it is registered.

Element.Name: Document References
Element.Description: The class is used to attach the qualification documents or other references such as the Call for Tender reference.

Element.Name: Qualification reference document identifier
Element.Description: The identifier of a qualification document provided by the economic operator. Is also used to provide a reference to the call for tender as issued by the contracting body to create links between the call for tender and the qualification documents. The value must be a UUID

Element.Name: Document type code
Element.Description: A code specifying the type of the document. The code 916 is used to reference to a qualification document. The code 311 is used to reference to the Call for Tender.

Attribute.Name: List identifier for document type code

Element.Name: Party reference
Element.Description: XPath reference to the party to whom this qualification document belongs.

Element.Name: Language
Element.Description: The language used to write the qualification document.

Element.Name: Call for tender version
Element.Description: Identifies the version of the call for tenders.

Element.Name: Document description
Element.Description: Textual description of the document. Might include information about the lots or type of qualification criteria to which the document replies.

Element.Name: Provided document url
Element.Description: URL where a document that is provided can be downloaded.

Element.Name: Document digest
Element.Description: Digest of the document, must be a SHA-256 value

Element.Name: Document digest method code
Element.Description: Code that indicates the algorithm used to calculate the hash.

Element.Name: Document mime type code
Element.Description: Mime code of the attached document (IANA)

Element.Name: Document name
Element.Description: The file name of the document.

Element.Name: Document size
Element.Description: The file size of the document.
